project.name: VDR
project.description: The Gentoo VDR Project maintains and updates the VDR packages in the portage tree?

longdescription.p: The Gentoo VDR Project maintains and updates the VDR packages in the portage tree. It integrates them with Gentoo as tight as possible. VDR is the abbreviation for Video Disk Recorder.

extrachapter.title: Things provided by the Gentoo VDR Project

body.p: The VDR-Project provides you with these things inside the portage tree:

ul.li: Complete patchsets contained in media-video/vdr to allow every combination of the possible use-flags.
media-tv/gentoo-vdr-scripts provides the complete init-script logic.
vdr-plugin.eclass to support the plugin-ebuilds with common tasks
A large number of plugins under media-plugins/vdr-* (around 90 at the moment)

body.p: If you want to help us with improving Gentoo's VDR experience, we would like to hear from you. You can contact us at vdr@gentoo.org. Please also join us in #gentoo-vdr on irc.freenode.org. You need not be a developer to be able to help us.

p.b: We need help in these ranges:

ul.li: Creating new concepts/visions, which make VDR on Gentoo more round.
